languages.text: "За ваши дела вас нужно признать имперск{mf|им|ой} свят{mf|ым|ой}!"

traits.locale_text: "За ваши дела вас нужно признать имперск{mf|им|ой} свят{mf|ым|ой}!"

languages.text: "For your deeds, you ought to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
languages.original_text: "За ваши дела вас нужно признать имперск{mf|им|ой} свят{mf|ым|ой}!"

traits.locale_text: "For your deeds you have to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium!"
"For your deeds you have to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium!"
"For your deeds, you must be recognised as a saint of the Imperium!"
"For your deeds, you must be recognised as a saint of the Imperium!"
"For your deeds, you ought to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

languages.text: “您成就了如此丰功伟业，您必将被封为帝国的圣人，大人！”
languages.original_text: "For your deeds, you ought to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: “您成就了如此丰功伟业，您必将被封为帝国的圣人，大人！”

languages.text: « Vous devriez être {mf|sanctifié|sanctifiée} par l'Imperium pour vos actes illustres, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: "For your deeds, you ought to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez être {mf|sanctifié|sanctifiée} par l'Imperium pour vos actes illustres, Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: 「陛下はその素晴らしき行いから、帝国の聖人として認められるべきでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "For your deeds, you ought to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下はその素晴らしき行いから、帝国の聖人として認められるべきでしょう！」

languages.text: «¡Por sus hazañas deberían nombrarle sant{mf|o|a} del Imperium, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: "For your deeds, you ought to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por sus hazañas deberían nombrarle sant{mf|o|a} del Imperium, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».

languages.text: "Für Eure Taten solltet Ihr als {mf|Heiliger|Heilige} des Imperiums anerkannt werden, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
languages.original_text: "For your deeds, you ought to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: "Für Eure Taten solltet Ihr als {mf|Heiliger|Heilige} des Imperiums anerkannt werden, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
"Für Eure Taten müsst Ihr als {mf|Heiliger|Heilige} des Imperiums anerkannt werden!"

languages.original_text: "For your deeds, you ought to be recognised as a saint of the Imperium, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
